summary: Adds a sorceress that can dual cast powerful spells, heal the player as well as herself, summon a dremora lord, and go invisible while sneaking in combat.
descriptionHtml:
Features:
- Adds a very powerful mage companion

Spells and abilities of Ina the Sorceress:
- Dual cast spells such as fireball, ice storm, and wall of frosts and fire
- Can summon a dremora lord
- Heal herself as well as the player
- Goes invisible while sneaking( if in combat)
- Has quiet casting, muffled movement, and shadow warrior perk.

Location:
- The Bee and Barb in Riften

Required mod:
- ApachiiSkyHair (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168)

Recommended mods and mods used in the screenshots:
- ApachiiSkyHair (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168)
- Covereyes (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869)
- Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666)
- Navetsea\'s Face Texture Pack (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554)
- Vibrant ENB (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20570)
- Witch Armour by Neo CBBE UNP (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16381)

Installation:
Manually:
- Simply drag the files in the skyrim data folder
- Make sure the plugin .esp is checked
NMM:
- Click \"Download with manager\"
- Make sure the plugin .esp is checked

Special Thanks and Other Stuff:
Fortrenty for the NPC Editor
Caliente for CBBE
Navetsea for Face Texture Pack
Kyokushinoyama for Vibrant ENB
Neovinci for Witch Armour
MrLenski for Covereyes
Apachii for ApachiiSkyHair

Up coming mods and projects:
- The Mighty Sten -- a giant orc warlord who knows the thu\'um.
- An all new Castle player home -- with a friendly dragon guarding it
- Underground Hideout -- a bat cave version of skyrim with a skeleton butler

Feel free to post any bug reports in the comment section.
Remember to endorse if you like the mod. And thanks for checking out my mod :)
author: nuclearpengu1nn

files.name: Ina the Sorceress
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the bug where she wouldn\'t cast a dremora lord
Fixed the bug where she wouldn\'t use a healing spell
Added some more spells such as paralyze and ice spike
Lowered her health to be more lore friendly
